originalText.text:
1 km from Brooklyn Bridge, Two bridges apartment is an apartment set in the Lower East Side district of New York. Guests staying at this apartment have access to free WiFi and a fully equipped kitchen.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Two bridges apartment include Bloomingdales, Ground Zero and One World Trade Center. The nearest airport is LaGuardia Airport, 12 km from the property.

originalText.text: Quarto pequeno em apartamento pequeno.  E bom para só quer usar mesmo para dormir. Se pretendem cozinhar, passar mais tempo em.casa não serve. Casa bastante limpa, e apesar de.numa das noites ter aparecido um rato,  o exterminador foi lá logo no dia seguinte.   4o andar sem elevador num prédio velho na zona de chinatown

text.text: Small room in small apartment. It's good for just wanting to use it to sleep. If you want to cook, spending more time at home is no good. Very clean house, and although a mouse appeared one night, the exterminator went there the next day. 4th floor without elevator in an old building in the Chinatown area
